Before starting, learn about some key terms used in the interface:

  • APPLET: The platform uses the term Applet instead of App. Applet refers to small applications, performing one or a few simple functions. So, you will be creating Applets.
  • ACTIVITY: Applets are made of activities, such as filling a survey, recording a video, and other digital tasks. So, you will be adding activities to your Applet.
  • ITEMS: Each activity is made of one or more item(s).
  • SCREENS: Each item includes one or more screens (these are the screens on your smartphone).

For details and Q&A have a look of the MindLogger Admin Guide https://mindlogger.org/guides/admin-guide.html

Example:
To further clarify the terms and their use, and illustrate the process, we will use this example: You are creating an applet to collect geo-located images of stray dogs. For each image, you would like your contributors to add their account of the dog attitude.

Go to admin.mindlogger.org

Login or create an account

For the first time you will see the welcome message.

Please click on the “CLICK HERE” button and select “Build an applet”.

Enter your applet name and description.
You can add more details in the about page, an image, and you have the choice of three themes.

Example:
Applet Name: Stray dogs (test)
Description: By using this App you provide information about the stray dogs you meet in your whereabouts. This will help...
